text: Don't Forget... Lugovaya Station () is a 1966 Soviet drama movie directed by Nikita Kurikhin and Leonid Menaker.Биография Леонида МенакераНЕ ЗАБУДЬ СТАНЦИЯ ЛУГОВАЯ It stars Georgiy Yumatov, Alla Chernova, and Valentina Vladimirova. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1966 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Nikita Kurikhin Category:Movies directed by Leonid Menaker
title: Don't Forget... Lugovaya Station
